pages.text: Hey man, you don't look like you're from around these parts. Lucky for you, I'm kind of a tour guide.

choices.text: Where's good to eat around here?

pages.text: So, what do you want to know?
I'll be here if you need me.
Life is the only thing cheaper than the thrills at the Alleycat. If I were you, I'd be careful you don't get eaten alive.
Takeshi's noodles was the best place, and just around the corner too. We  don't talk about what happened to this him.
